question.title: Spring JPA - Can we override the native SQL for save method of JPA repository in Update case
question.body:
I am using Spring boot and JPA repository for my application For database i am using PostgreSQL database.

I have crores of data in my table employee. Due to performance issue i have implemented database partition on employee table with partition column of company_id.

so whenever i perform any database query on employee table i always pass the company_id condition for the batter performance.

now the question is that when i perform any changes in employee record i always use Save method of JPA repository. The save method internally create the native SQL query for update the record but it update the row by only emp_id (PK). Due to this the performance again goes down because we do not have company_id check in where condition.

Now i want to add Company_id check in entity update operation for the batter performance how should i achieve this.

Please let me know if any additional information is required.

Please guide. Thanks
